name: Click To The Space | Clicker Jam
name_original: Click To The Space | Clicker Jam
description:
My first Jam.

  • 72h to do a clicker. 
  • Theme: Sci-Fi

I'm so happy to participate and challenge myself.

Credits

All exept the Song of Background its make it for me.

Song by: Nctrmn.

Sorry for the style, I'm not a artist, only a one programmer, and I try to do my best.

Game at the time of delivery to the Jam.

That is my game to 7 Hours left to submit.

Is not only a problem to Canvas and size, its a problem to depth and Camera.

And I practically have to reestart all. Delete the scene, and starting again. (Obvius using what I already had).

And this made me unable to do more details and other. :c
